Smart Power Strip: A power strip with built-in Wi-Fi connectivity that allows users to control and monitor their devices remotely using a smartphone app. This power strip can also detect energy usage patterns and provide insights on how to reduce energy consumption.

Power Strip with Built-In USB Charging Ports: A power strip with multiple USB charging ports, allowing users to charge multiple devices at once, such as smartphones, tablets, and laptops. This power strip can also have a built-in surge protector to protect devices from power surges and spikes.

Motion-Sensing Power Strip: A power strip that can detect movement and automatically turn on or off based on a user's schedule or preferences. This can help save energy by avoiding standby power consumption when the room is unoccupied.

Power Strip with Built-In Power Bank: A power strip with a built-in power bank that can charge devices on the go. This power strip can be particularly useful for travelers or people who are always on the move.

Smart Power Strip with Energy Monitoring: A power strip with built-in energy monitoring capabilities, allowing users to track their energy consumption in real-time. This power strip can also provide recommendations on how to reduce energy usage and offer tips on energy-saving practices.
